uber

Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • uber.User
      • uber.Customer

  • public class Customer
extends User
    Customer class to represent a User that can make a Request for a service from Uber. Contains a HashMap of properties and inherits from the class User.
    Author:
    FaithChan
